thread.title: Catholic Priest Faces Criminal Charge Over ‘Bite’ Defense of the Eucharist from Angry Lesbian
thread.title_full: Catholic Priest Faces Criminal Charge Over ‘Bite’ Defense of the Eucharist from Angry Lesbian

author: LifeSite
title: Catholic Priest Faces Criminal Charge Over ‘Bite’ Defense of the Eucharist from Angry Lesbian
text: [Back](/video/)— Video Topics | [Pro-life](/video/video-pro-life/)| [Pro-family](/video/video-pro-family/)| [Catholic Church](/video/video-catholic-church/)| [Freedom](/video/video-freedom/) Catholic priest faces criminal charge over 'bite' defense of the Eucharist from angry lesbian Breaking News [See More](/shows/breaking-news/) A Catholic priest in Florida is facing one count of battery for defending the Body and Blood of Jesus Christ from a lesbian who crushed several consecrated hosts while trying to minister herself Holy Communion, prompting him to bite her arm.
